name: llm-research-lab
description: LLM Research Lab - Experimental Evaluation Platform for Large Language Models

scripts.build: echo 'Cloud Function: no build step required'
scripts.test:cf: node -e "const h = require('./index.js'); console.log('handler exported:', typeof h.handler === 'function')"
scripts.deploy: gcloud functions deploy research-lab-agents --runtime nodejs20 --trigger-http --region us-central1 --project agentics-dev --entry-point handler --memory 512MB --timeout 120s --no-allow-unauthenticated
